title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 19 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 19 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.
lineList.cn: 诸天述说神的荣耀，穹苍传扬他的手段。

lineList.en: Day unto day uttereth speech, and night unto night sheweth knowledge.
lineList.cn: 这日到那日发出言语。这夜到那夜传出知识。

lineList.en: There is no speech nor language, where their voice is not heard.
lineList.cn: 无言无语，也无声音可听。

lineList.en: Their line is gone out through all the earth, and their words to the end of the world. In them hath he set a tabernacle for the sun,
lineList.cn: 他的量带通遍天下，他的言语传到地极。神在其间为太阳安设帐幕。

lineList.en: Which is as a bridegroom coming out of his chamber, and rejoiceth as a strong man to run a race.
lineList.cn: 太阳如同新郎出洞房，又如勇士欢然奔路。

lineList.en: His going forth is from the end of the heaven, and his circuit unto the ends of it: and there is nothing hid from the heat thereof.
lineList.cn: 他从天这边出来，绕到天那边。没有一物被隐藏不得他的热气。

lineList.en: The law of the LORD is perfect, converting the soul: the testimony of the LORD is sure, making wise the simple.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的律法全备，能苏醒人心。耶和华的法度确定，能使愚人有智慧。

lineList.en: The statutes of the LORD are right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the LORD is pure, enlightening the eyes.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的训词正直，能快活人心。耶和华的命令清洁，能明亮人的眼目。

lineList.en: The fear of the LORD is clean, enduring for ever: the judgments of the LORD are true and righteous altogether.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的道理洁净，存到永远。耶和华的典章真实，全然公义。

lineList.en: More to be desired are they than gold, yea, than much fine gold: sweeter also than honey and the honeycomb.
lineList.cn: 都比金子可羡慕，且比极多的精金可羡慕。比蜜甘甜，且比蜂房下滴的蜜甘甜。

lineList.en: Moreover by them is thy servant warned: and in keeping of them there is great reward.
lineList.cn: 况且你的仆人因此受警戒。守着这些便有大赏。

lineList.en: Who can understand his errors? cleanse thou me from secret faults.
lineList.cn: 谁能知道自己的错失呢。愿你赦免我隐而未现的过错。

lineList.en: Keep back thy servant also from presumptuous sins; let them not have dominion over me: then shall I be upright, and I shall be innocent from the great transgression.
lineList.cn: 求你拦阻仆人，不犯任意妄为的罪。不容这罪辖制我。我便完全，免犯大罪。

lineList.en: Let the words of my mouth, and the meditation of my heart, be acceptable in thy sight, O LORD, my strength, and my redeemer.
lineList.cn: 耶和华我的磐石，我的救赎主阿，愿我口中的言语，心中的意念，在你面前蒙悦纳。
